name: /about-aws/whats-new/2004/11/03/introducing-the-amazon-simple-queue-service/
author: aws
postSummary: The Amazon Simple Queue Service is now available for beta testing. This service offers a reliable, highly scalable hosted queue for buffering messages between distributed application components. Read more
headline: Introducing the Amazon Simple Queue Service

name: /about-aws/whats-new/2004/10/04/introducing-the-alexa-web-information-service/
author: aws
postSummary: The Alexa Web Information Service (AWIS) is now available for beta testing. AWIS provides powerful operations for accessing information on Websites, based on Alexa.com’s “World’s Largest” Webcrawl of over 4 billion pages. The AWIS operations allow developers to access information on a Web site’s popularity, related sites, detailed usage/traffic stats, metadata available from the crawl, links-in and links-out, and much more. Read more.
headline: Introducing the Alexa Web Information Service
